item.title: Compressed CPU / GPU plotting
item.description: https://github.com/madMAx43v3r/mmx-binaries With the highest sensible compression level you will get 40% more rewards, however it requires a GPU for farming (like a GTX 1650 at least). You need to run the binary harvester or full node from mmx-binaries/mmx-node/ to farm the new plots (it also supports regular plots). The chart for k32 shows all the different compression levels and how big of a farm is supported via a single RTX 3060 for farming.
